page.title: 11Education
page.content: Secondary school pupils from East Wemyss, Coaltown of Wemyss, Buckhaven and other surrounding villages all attend Buckhaven High School. The High School is just outside this Domesday square on the A.955 to Leven. The villages all have their own primary schools but the only one within this area is East Wemyss Primary. East Wemyss Primary School also houses the Wemyss Environmental Education Centre (W.E.E.C.) in the basement. The centre has carried out several projects in the Wemyss area and there is now a considerable amount of interpretive material available to the public. The aim of the centre is to develop an interest in the environment and an attitude of care. Many primary schools visit on educational trips and the centre is also open to the general public.
